name: AKASH BHAWAN
description:
### Akash Bhawan
**4 student accommodation**, decent rooms, decent food.
- A-block is better
- Has Volleyball court
- For 1st year boys

name: ARYABHATTA BHAWAN
description:
### Aryabhatta Bhawan
**4 student accommodation**, rooms are not great, but food is good.
- East block is better
- Includes Badminton and Basketball courts
- For 2nd year boys

name: BHASKAR BHAWAN
description:
### Bhaskar Bhawan
**3 student accommodation**, decent rooms, great structure.
- Good food
- Has Badminton court
- For 2nd and 3rd year boys

name: BRAHMOS BHAWAN
description:
### Brahmos Bhawan
**2 student accommodation**, great rooms, great structure.
- Good food
- Includes 3 blocks
- Badminton court
- For 3rd, 4th year, and MCA boys
- Needs good grades for allotment

name: SURYA BHAWAN
description:
### Surya Bhawan
**1 student accommodation**
- For 4th year boys
- Has Basketball and Badminton courts
- Needs top grades for allotment

name: ROHINI BHAWAN
description:
### Rohini Bhawan
**6 student accommodation**
- For 1st, 2nd year, diploma, and MCA girls

name: PRITHVI BHAWAN
description:
### Prithvi Bhawan
- For 3rd and 4th year girls

name: AGNI BHAWAN
description:
### Agni Bhawan
**4 student accommodation**
- Has outdoor space
- For Diploma boys

name: Cafeteria
description:
### Cafeteria
- College Cafeteria

name: Old Canteen (OC)
description:
### Old Canteen (OC)
- Located at the old building

name: BME Lab
description:
### Basic Mechanical Engineering Lab
- For 1st year
- Great learning experience, great teachers
- Location: Near the new building entrance

name: Workshop
description:
### Workshop
- For 1st year
- Mostly idle time
- Location: Opposite BME Lab

name: BE Lab
description:
### Basic Electronics Engineering Lab
- For 1st year
- Great viva preparation
- Location: Near the main gate or dome or central library

name: BEE Lab
description:
### Basic Electrical Engineering Lab
- For 1st year
- Make your presence known to teachers
- Location: Near the park, turn right

name: Civil Lab
description:
### Civil Engineering Lab
- For 1st year
- Location: Move inward from BEE lab towards the hall, then take the 2nd left

name: Chemistry Lab
description:
### Chemistry Lab
- For 1st year
- Group-based experiments (4 members/group)
- Location: Near room 206, take a straight path towards the stairs

name: Physics Lab
description:
### Physics Lab
- For 1st year
- Marks based on viva and semester exams
- Location: Opposite Chemistry Lab

name: English Lab
description:
### English Lab
- AC Lab
- Minimal classes
- Records usually not checked

name: Library
description:
### Library
- Best study environment
- Air-conditioned and quiet
- Location: Near the dome/main gate

name: Badminton court
description:
### Badminton Court
- Location: Old building

name: Room 206
description:
### Room 206
- Classroom for many subjects
- Location: Old building

name: Academic building
description:
### Academic Building
- For admissions and academic queries
- Staff is straightforward

name: Park
description:
### Park
- Relaxation spot on campus
